channel.title: Weight Loss and The Mind 2.0 | Diet | Fitness | Health | Exercise | Yoga | Healthy Thoughts
channel.description:
Lose weight and stay slim. "Think Fit. Be Fit." is our motto.Each week Scott Paton discusses how you can effectively use your mind to control your mouth.
They show you easy, simple mind techniques that powerfully affect your emotional states.
People from all walks of life visit with us every week. Why don't you join us?
channel.itunes:subtitle: Lose Weight and remain healthy and fit
channel.itunes:author: Scott Paton
channel.itunes:summary:
Lose weight and stay slim. "Think Fit. Be Fit." is our motto.Each week Scott Paton discusses how you can effectively use your mind to control your mouth.
They show you easy, simple mind techniques that powerfully affect your emotional states.
People from all walks of life visit with us every week. Why don't you join us?

item.title: Fitness Tips from Arizona | Weight Loss and the Mind 2.0 | Podcast #106
item.description: Scotsdale, Arizona welcomes Scott Paton and Matt Furey. Hanging at the Camelback Inn, Scott catches up with the beautiful Sabrina. They discuss weight loss from the top of Mummy Mountain. Weight Loss and dieting are an epidemic in today's society. It is more a function of how we think than anything else. There are hundreds of diets and exercise programs out there. Yet 'yo-yo' dieting is a cliche. We all know that there is more to it. Why do we eat foods we KNOW add weight and inches to our waist and hips? Why do we sit in front of the tube for hours at a time instead of going for that wonderful walk in the park?The answer lies in our MINDS. Each podcast, Shane and Scott delve into a different topic related to using your mind to achieve that long-sought-after goal -- a healthy body. Go to iTunes and review our podcast: Weight Loss and The Mind Reviews and 5 star ratings Every review and 5 star rating adds to the popularity of my podcast and helps us put the word out to more people. Make sure to leave a Comment. Your feedback is much appreciated! item.title: 4 Choices | Weight Loss and the Mind 2.0 | Podcast #105
item.description: You have four choices in life. You can make them or not. Not making one is a choice. Discover what they are and how making the right one can change your life forever. In today's podcast, Scott Paton and Matt Furey discuss Weight Loss and dieting are an epidemic in today's society. It is more a function of how we think than anything else. There are hundreds of diets and exercise programs out there. Yet 'yo-yo' dieting is a cliche. We all know that there is more to it. Why do we eat foods we KNOW add weight and inches to our waist and hips? Why do we sit in front of the tube for hours at a time instead of going for that wonderful walk in the park?The answer lies in our MINDS. Each podcast, Shane and Scott delve into a different topic related to using your mind to achieve that long-sought-after goal -- a healthy body. Go to iTunes and review our podcast: Weight Loss and The Mind Reviews and 5 star ratings Every review and 5 star rating adds to the popularity of my podcast and helps us put the word out to more people. item.title: The Ultimate Waist Reducer | Weight Loss and the Mind | Episode #104
item.description: What's the story on Coffee? Matt and Scott In today's podcast, Scott Paton and Matt Furey discuss the one exercise 'tweak' thta will shave inches off your waist - effortlessly! Weight Loss and dieting are an epidemic in today's society. It is more a function of how we think than anything else. There are hundreds of diets and exercise programs out there. Yet 'yo-yo' dieting is a cliche. We all know that there is more to it. Why do we eat foods we KNOW add weight and inches to our waist and hips? Why do we sit in front of the tube for hours at a time instead of going for that wonderful walk in the park?The answer lies in our MINDS. Each podcast, Shane and Scott delve into a different topic related to using your mind to achieve that long-sought-after goal -- a healthy body. item.title: Shaolin Monks and Discipline | Weight Loss and the Mind 2.0 | Podcast #103
item.description: Discover the power of discipline. Matt and Scott share powerful strategies that impact all areas of yoru life and especially the area around your stomach. Weight Loss and dieting are an epidemic in today's society. It is more a function of how we think than anything else. There are hundreds of diets and exercise programs out there. Yet 'yo-yo' dieting is a cliche. We all know that there is more to it. Why do we eat foods we KNOW add weight and inches to our waist and hips? Why do we sit in front of the tube for hours at a time instead of going for that wonderful walk in the park?The answer lies in our MINDS. Each podcast, Shane and Scott delve into a different topic related to using your mind to achieve that long-sought-after goal -- a healthy body. item.itunes:summary:
Our 100th episode!
Matt talks about the power of Willpower and what trumps it everytime.
Weight Loss and dieting are an epidemic in today's society. It is more a function of how we think than anything else. There are hundreds of diets and exercise programs out there. Yet 'yo-yo' dieting is a cliche. We all know that there is more to it. Why do we eat foods we KNOW add weight and inches to our waist and hips? Why do we sit in front of the tube for hours at a time instead of going for that wonderful walk in the park?The answer lies in our MINDS. Each podcast, Shane and Scott delve into a different topic related to using your mind to achieve that long-sought-after goal -- a healthy body.
Go to iTunes and review our podcast: Weight Loss and The Mind Reviews and 5 star ratings
Every review and 5 star rating adds to the popularity of my podcast and helps us put the word out to more people.
Make sure to leave a Comment. Your feedback is much appreciated!

item.title: Effortlessly Strive | Weight Loss and the Mind 2.0 | Podcast #95
item.description: In today's podcast, Scott Paton and Matt Furey discuss striving effortlessly. Why make everything hard? But making it easy isn't necessarily the answer either... Weight Loss and dieting are an epidemic in today's society. It is more a function of how we think than anything else. There are hundreds of diets and exercise programs out there. Yet 'yo-yo' dieting is a cliche. We all know that there is more to it. Why do we eat foods we KNOW add weight and inches to our waist and hips? Why do we sit in front of the tube for hours at a time instead of going for that wonderful walk in the park?The answer lies in our MINDS. Each podcast, Shane and Scott delve into a different topic related to using your mind to achieve that long-sought- after goal -- a healthy body. item.title: The Snap Back Effect and Your Weight | Weight Loss and the Mind 2.0 | Podcast #94
item.description: In today's podcast, Scott Paton and Matt Furey discuss the impact your self-image has on your weight and the infamous "Snap Back" Effect. Weight Loss and dieting are an epidemic in today's society. It is more a function of how we think than anything else. There are hundreds of diets and exercise programs out there. Yet 'yo-yo' dieting is a cliche. We all know that there is more to it. Why do we eat foods we KNOW add weight and inches to our waist and hips? Why do we sit in front of the tube for hours at a time instead of going for that wonderful walk in the park?The answer lies in our MINDS. Each podcast, Shane and Scott delve into a different topic related to using your mind to achieve that long-sought-after goal -- a healthy body.
